Question: The parody was pulled from this person's Straight Outta Lynwood because of his label's unwillingness to "go to war" with Atlantic.
Hints: In 1983, this person's first self-titled album was released on Scotti Bros.
This person has also started to explore digital distribution of his songs.
This person has hosted Al TV on MTV and Al Music on MuchMusic many times, generally coinciding with the release of each new album.
